Articles.Content:
Hi all.

I had nothing to do and I made for the lulz mobile spaceport. It has 4 pads for landing ships, and a lot of fuel. IT IS NOT FIT ON A LAUNCH PAD! You should build a tower from tanks.

It\'s not need launchers. It can fly to the moon itself. I didn\'t try to fly to Minmus, but you can change config if you need more fuel. Have fun!

[![a920daafb2c2517017a155cee31cb79c.jpeg](http://i34.fastpic.ru/big/2012/0525/9c/a920daafb2c2517017a155cee31cb79c.jpeg)](http://fastpic.ru/)

**Planned features in 1.1:**

Monorail(will be animated if somebody tell me how to make it)

Config fixes

Hotel

Bigger landing pads

Some other buildings

**1.1 release soon!**
